title: Syndra bugs

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I'd like to report few bugs about     {{champion:134}}    after the latest patch:

* First is her floating/walking animation - it's like the skin Atlantean Syndra, affects Classic, Justicar, Queen of Diamonds and Snow Day.
* Recall animation bug; (I couldn't take any screenshots; The animation after she backed first shows up, then the actual recall; doesn't affect Snow Day Syndra skin)
* Death/corpse.

replies.body: Replied to your other post, but for visibility, we're working on a fix! ^-^
